summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Alluz Energia landing page with CMS/admin system. All core features working correctly including lead capture, WhatsApp integration, and admin dashboard.

minor_issues.issue: Returns HTTP 200 instead of 201 for creation
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact, just non-standard status code

design_issues.issue: Content was updated to 'Test Title Update' during testing - should be reverted to original

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Hero, Plans, FAQ, Footer
API GET /api/content returns site content correctly
API GET /api/plans returns 3+ plans with proper structure
Modal form opens when CTA buttons are clicked
Form submission creates lead and shows success modal
WhatsApp redirection button appears after form submission
Admin login works with credentials admin/admin123
Admin dashboard displays leads, plans, content, WhatsApp config
Admin can export CSV of leads
Rate limiting implemented on lead creation
action_item_for_main_agent: Content cleanup needed: Revert hero_titulo from 'Test Title Update' to original content. All functionality is working correctly.
